Instructions

  • Purchasing A Device:
    1. Connect your Metamask wallet to the Rinkeby test network.
      • Requirements:
        1. Must be Approved
        2. QSM balance of over 3630
        3. Buy Testnet QSM on Uniswap while connected to Rinkeby test network
    2. Located at the top of the dApp, click the yellow Connect Wallet button.
    3. Click the Yellow Approve then Purchase NFT button and confirm transaction through metamask.
    4. Once the transaction is confirmed, your NFTs ID# will be displayed under "My NFT ID Numbers".
    5. Open menu and click View Transaction to confirm your Cryptogotchi ID# with the one displayed in the dApp.
  • Basics:
      • Requirements:
        1. Using A browser that supports Metamask and is connected to Rinkeby Test Network
        2. Get Rinkeby ETH Here
        3. Have a ID# from a Cryptogotchi NFT Device that you own.
    1. Feed once a day to keep your Cryptogotchi alive.
    2. Play to earn QSM tokens and increase Cryptogotchi's generation.
    3. Don't let your Cryptogotchi die from lack of proper feeding.
  • Hatching:
    1. Initial Hatch sets the color of a Cryptogotchi.
    2. Hatching a Cryptogotchi sets its required daily feeding time. Choose wisely!
  • Feeding:
    1. Pet must be fed within the Feed Window based on its current Generation.
      • feed window calculation:> 1 hour * current generation + 1
    2. Hatching or Reviving your pet sets its daily feeding time.
    3. Your pet must be kept alive by "Feeding" it once every 24 hours.
    4. Day passes can be purchased with QSM tokens. Tokens are then burnt.
  • Playing:
    1. Clicking the Play button the required amount of times rewards the user with QSM tokens.
    2. The amount of time between Plays and the amount of Plays required to receive QSM rewards are based on your pets current Prestige and Generation.
      • time calculation: 1 hour + current prestige x 1 hour
      • play requirement amount calculation: current generation
  • Prestige:
    • Requirements:
      1. Pet must be at generation 10.
      2. All pending QSM rewards must be withdrawn into users wallet.
    1. Resets your pets Generation to 1 and Feed Window back to 1 hour.
    2. Adds an additional one hour to time between Plays
    3. In order to continue receiving QSM rewards, a device must Prestige.
  • Reviving:
    • Requirements:
      1. Pet must have died from lack of proper Feeding.
      2. Must send back all QSM rewards from current Prestige.
      3. QSM is automatically subtracted from your wallet balance on Revival.
    1. Reviving does not reset Prestige.
    2. QSM Rewards for current Prestige starts again at 1.
  • Rewards:
    1. QSM Rewards are based on a Cryptogotchi's current Generation and Prestige.
    2. Rewards start small and incrementally get larger over time.
    3. Length between rewards starts at 1 hour and incrementally get longer over time.
    4. Required amount of Plays per reward increments up 1 every new Generation and resets back to 1 at Prestige.
    5. There is no max QSM reward amount or Prestige, but length between rewards will forever get longer.
    6. Calculation
      • rewards calculation:> (generation x reward) x (prestige +1 ) + reward
  • Theory:
    1. If a user were to properly play and feed their pet for 6 months without the device ever requiring a revival, they would have minted back the purchase cost of thier NFT. (3,630 QSM)
    2. Total supply of Meed tokens used for initial liquidity would be required to mint the first 10,000 NFT's.
    3. After 6 months (if all 10,000 devices were used properly) there would again be available the initial Meed supply and another 10,000 NFT's would then be able to be minted. Then the cycle repeats. There is no max NFT amount or Meed token supply cap, but supply will maintain itself with the deflationary mechanisms.
    4. If Meed tokens are burned on purchase of a Cryptogotchi NFT, there may be a sharp deflation in circulating Meed tokens at Mainnet launch.
    5. Meed tokens used purchasing day passes are burned adding to deflation.
    6. Meed tokens used to purchase NFT's are also burnt adding to deflation.
